text/x-wiki
"Sammafar" was an official title in the Kingdom of Tethyr. A sammafar was the head manager of a nobles estate, ensuring the maintenance of the physical location and the direction of its personnel. While unable to command troops, sammafars often provided advice on matters of estate security.
A sammafar was the direct superior to those holding the titles of bailiff and farsann.
* List of notable sammafars
